00059 const char TeleopSourceNode::TELEOP_TYPE_AUTO[] =               "auto";
00060 const char TeleopSourceNode::TELEOP_TYPE_KEYBOARD[] =           "keyboard";
00061 const char TeleopSourceNode::TELEOP_TYPE_JOYSTICK[] =           "joystick";
00062 
00063 const char TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TOPIC[] =         "teleop_topic";
00064 const char TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TYPE[] =          "teleop_type";
00065 const char TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_LISTEN_TIMEOUT[] =       "listen_timeout";
00066 const char TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_AXIS_DEAD_ZONE[] =       "axis_dead_zone";
00067 const char TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_KEYBOARD_STEPS[] =       "keyboard_steps";
00068 const char TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_KEY_JOYSTICK_DEVICE[] =      "joystick_device";
00069 
00070 const char TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TOPIC[] =     "teleop";
00071 const char* TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TYPE =       TeleopSourceNode::TELEOP_TYPE_KEYBOARD;
00072 const int  TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_LISTEN_TIMEOUT =     TeleopSourceAdapter::LISTEN_TIMEOUT_DEFAULT;
00073 const double TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_AXIS_DEAD_ZONE =   TeleopSourceAdapter::AXIS_DEAD_ZONE_DEFAULT;
00074 const int  TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_KEYBOARD_STEPS =     TeleopSourceKeyboard::STEPS_DEFAULT;
00075 
00076 //Ideally this should be TeleopSourceJoystick::getDefaultDevice().c_str(),
00077 //but C++ makes this difficult.  Since we assume the user should set this
00078 //parameter explicitly if needed anyway, we use a hard-coded default.
00079 const char TeleopSourceNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_JOYSTICK_DEVICE[] =  "/dev/input/js0";

00087 TeleopSourceNode::TeleopSourceNode() :
00088   mTeleopTopic(PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TOPIC),
00089   mTeleopType(PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TYPE),
00090   mListenTimeout(PARAM_DEFAULT_LISTEN_TIMEOUT),
00091   mAxisDeadZone(PARAM_DEFAULT_AXIS_DEAD_ZONE),
00092   mKeyboardSteps(PARAM_DEFAULT_KEYBOARD_STEPS),
00093   mJoystickDevice(PARAM_DEFAULT_JOYSTICK_DEVICE),
00094   mTeleopSource(NULL),
00095   mIsInitialised(false) {
00096 }
00097 //=============================================================================
00098 TeleopSourceNode::~TeleopSourceNode() {
00099   //Shutdown (should always succeed)
00100   if (!shutdown()) {
00101     ROS_WARN("TeleopSourceNode::~TeleopSourceNode: ignoring error in shutdown");
00102   }
00103 }
00104 //=============================================================================
00105 bool TeleopSourceNode::init(int argc, char** argv, std::string nodeName, uint32_t rosInitOptions) {
00106   //Lock access to is initialised
00107   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> isInitialisedLock(mIsInitialisedMutex);
00108 
00109   //If already initialised shutdown first (shutdown should always succeed)
00110   if (mIsInitialised && !shutdown()) {
00111     ROS_WARN("TeleopSourceNode::init: ignoring error in shutdown()");
00112   }
00113 
00114   //Init node
00115   try {
00116     ros::init(argc, argv, nodeName, rosInitOptions);
00117   } catch(ros::InvalidNodeNameException& e) {
00118     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::init: error initialising node");
00119     return false;
00120   }
00121 
00122   //Start node manually to avoid node shutdown when last node handle is destroyed
00123   ros::start();
00124 
00125   //Init parameters
00126   try {
00127     //Create private node handle for parameters
00128     ros::NodeHandle nodeHandlePrivate("~");
00129 
00130     //Read parameters and/or set default values
00131     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TOPIC,    mTeleopTopic, nodeName + "/" + PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TOPIC);
00132     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TYPE,     mTeleopType,     std::string(PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TYPE));
00133     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_LISTEN_TIMEOUT,  mListenTimeout,  PARAM_DEFAULT_LISTEN_TIMEOUT);
00134     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_AXIS_DEAD_ZONE,  mAxisDeadZone,   PARAM_DEFAULT_AXIS_DEAD_ZONE);
00135     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_KEYBOARD_STEPS,  mKeyboardSteps,  PARAM_DEFAULT_KEYBOARD_STEPS);
00136     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_JOYSTICK_DEVICE, mJoystickDevice, std::string(PARAM_DEFAULT_JOYSTICK_DEVICE));
00137 
00138     //Advertise all parameters to allow introspection
00139     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TOPIC,    mTeleopTopic);
00140     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TYPE,     mTeleopType);
00141     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_LISTEN_TIMEOUT,  mListenTimeout);
00142     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_AXIS_DEAD_ZONE,  mAxisDeadZone);
00143     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_KEYBOARD_STEPS,  mKeyboardSteps);
00144     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_JOYSTICK_DEVICE, mJoystickDevice);
00145   } catch (ros::InvalidNameException& e) {
00146     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::init: error initialising parameters");
00147     ros::shutdown();
00148     return false;
00149   }
00150 
00151   //Create publisher
00152   try {
00153     //Create relative node handle for topics
00154     ros::NodeHandle nodeHandleRelative = ros::NodeHandle();
00155 
00156     //Create publisher with buffer size set to 1 and latching on.  The publisher
00157     //should basically just always contain the latest state.
00158     mPublisher = nodeHandleRelative.advertise<teleop_msgs::State>(mTeleopTopic, 1, true);
00159   } catch (ros::InvalidNameException& e) {
00160     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::init: error creating publisher");
00161     ros::shutdown();
00162     return false;
00163   }
00164 
00165   //Create teleop source
00166   mTeleopSource = teleopSourceFactory();
00167   if (NULL == mTeleopSource) {
00168     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::init: error creating teleop source");
00169     ros::shutdown();
00170     return false;
00171   }
00172 
00173   //Initialise and configure teleop source adapter
00174   if (!mTeleopSourceAdapter.init(mTeleopSource, this)) {
00175     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::init: error initialising teleop source adapter");
00176     delete mTeleopSource;
00177     ros::shutdown();
00178     return false;
00179   }
00180   if (!mTeleopSourceAdapter.setListenTimeout((unsigned int)mListenTimeout)
00181       || !mTeleopSourceAdapter.setAxisDeadZoneForAllAxes((TeleopAxisValue)mAxisDeadZone)) {
00182     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::init: error configuring teleop source adapter");
00183     delete mTeleopSource;
00184     ros::shutdown();
00185     return false;
00186   }
00187 
00188   //Start teleop source adapter
00189   if (!mTeleopSourceAdapter.start(false)) {
00190     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::init: error starting teleop source");
00191     delete mTeleopSource;
00192     ros::shutdown();
00193     return false;
00194   }
00195 
00196   //Update init done flag
00197   mIsInitialised = true;
00198 
00199   //Return result
00200   return true;
00201 }
00202 //=============================================================================
00203 bool TeleopSourceNode::shutdown() {
00204   //Lock access to is initialised
00205   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> isInitialisedLock(mIsInitialisedMutex);
00206 
00207   //Check if done
00208   if (!mIsInitialised) {
00209     return true;
00210   }
00211 
00212   //Shutdown teleop source adapter (will stop if necessary)
00213   if (!mTeleopSourceAdapter.shutdown()) {
00214     ROS_WARN("TeleopSourceNode::shutdown: ignoring error in teleop source adapter shutdown");
00215   }
00216 
00217   //Free teleop source
00218   if (NULL != mTeleopSource) {
00219     delete mTeleopSource;
00220     mTeleopSource = NULL;
00221   } else {
00222     ROS_WARN("TeleopSourceNode::shutdown: teleop source already deleted");
00223   }
00224 
00225   //Zero message
00226   for (size_t i = 0; i < mTeleopStateMsg.axes.size(); i++) {
00227     mTeleopStateMsg.axes[i].value = 0.0;
00228   }
00229   for (size_t i = 0; i < mTeleopStateMsg.buttons.size(); i++) {
00230     mTeleopStateMsg.buttons[i].value = 0;
00231   }
00232 
00233   //Publish zero message
00234   mPublisher.publish(mTeleopStateMsg);
00235 
00236   //Sleep a bit to allow zero message to be published before node is shutdown.
00237   //Use boost thread sleep rather than ROS sleep since ROS sleep may try to use
00238   //a simulated clock, which may be stopped.
00239   boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(500));
00240 
00241   //Shutdown node
00242   ros::shutdown();
00243 
00244   //Set init done flag
00245   mIsInitialised = false;
00246 
00247   //Return result
00248   return true;
00249 }
00250 //=============================================================================
00251 TeleopSource* TeleopSourceNode::teleopSourceFactory() {
00252   TeleopSource* teleopSource = NULL;
00253   std::string teleopType = mTeleopType;
00254 
00255   //If type is auto, check for best alternative
00256   if (0 == teleopType.compare(std::string(TELEOP_TYPE_AUTO))) {
00257     TeleopSourceJoystick* teleopSourceJoystick;
00258     teleopSourceJoystick = new TeleopSourceJoystick();
00259     teleopSourceJoystick->setDevice(mJoystickDevice);
00260     if (teleopSourceJoystick->init()) {
00261       if (!teleopSourceJoystick->shutdown()) {
00262         ROS_WARN("TeleopSourceNode::teleopSourceFactory: ignoring error during TeleopSourceJoystick shutdown");
00263       }
00264       teleopType = std::string(TELEOP_TYPE_JOYSTICK);
00265     } else {
00266       teleopType = std::string(TELEOP_TYPE_KEYBOARD);
00267     }
00268     delete teleopSourceJoystick;
00269   }
00270 
00271   //Handle known types
00272   if (0 == teleopType.compare(std::string(TELEOP_TYPE_KEYBOARD))) {
00273     TeleopSourceKeyboard* teleopSourceKeyboard;
00274     teleopSourceKeyboard = new TeleopSourceKeyboard();
00275     if (!teleopSourceKeyboard->setSteps((unsigned int)mKeyboardSteps)) {
00276       ROS_WARN("TeleopSourceNode::teleopSourceFactory: unable to set keyboard steps");
00277     }
00278     teleopSource = teleopSourceKeyboard;
00279   } else if (0 == teleopType.compare(std::string(TELEOP_TYPE_JOYSTICK))) {
00280     TeleopSourceJoystick* teleopSourceJoystick;
00281     teleopSourceJoystick = new TeleopSourceJoystick();
00282     if (!teleopSourceJoystick->setDevice(mJoystickDevice)) {
00283       ROS_WARN("TeleopSourceNode::teleopSourceFactory: unable to set joystick device");
00284     }
00285     teleopSource = teleopSourceJoystick;
00286   } else {
00287     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::teleopSourceFactory: unknown teleop source type (%s)", teleopType.c_str());
00288     return NULL;
00289   }
00290 
00291   //Return result
00292   return teleopSource;
00293 }
00294 //=============================================================================
00295 void TeleopSourceNode::updated(const TeleopState* const teleopState, bool stopping, bool error) {
00296   //Sanity check teleopState
00297   if (NULL == teleopState) {
00298     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::updated: NULL teleopState");
00299     return;
00300   }
00301 
00302   //Convert from TeleopState to teleop_msgs::State
00303   if (mTeleopStateMsg.axes.size() != teleopState->axes.size()) {
00304     mTeleopStateMsg.axes.resize(teleopState->axes.size());
00305   }
00306   if (mTeleopStateMsg.buttons.size() != teleopState->buttons.size()) {
00307     mTeleopStateMsg.buttons.resize(teleopState->buttons.size());
00308   }
00309   for (size_t i = 0; i < mTeleopStateMsg.axes.size(); i++) {
00310     mTeleopStateMsg.axes[i].type = teleopState->axes[i].type;
00311     mTeleopStateMsg.axes[i].value = teleopState->axes[i].value;
00312   }
00313   for (size_t i = 0; i < mTeleopStateMsg.buttons.size(); i++) {
00314     mTeleopStateMsg.buttons[i].type = teleopState->buttons[i].type;
00315     mTeleopStateMsg.buttons[i].value = teleopState->buttons[i].value;
00316   }
00317 
00318   //Publish result
00319   mPublisher.publish(mTeleopStateMsg);
00320 
00321   //On error just print a message.  The stopping condition will be handled in
00322   //the stopping() callback, so we can safely ignore it here.
00323   if (error) {
00324     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::updated: error detected");
00325   }
00326 }
00327 //=============================================================================
00328 void TeleopSourceNode::stopping(bool error) {
00329   //On error just print a message.
00330   if (error) {
00331     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSourceNode::stopping: error detected");
00332   }
00333 }
